awards:
第72届柏林国际电影节(2022)
　　主竞赛单元 最佳短片(提名) 阿德里安·乔弗伦克 / 拉杜·裘德

writer.name: 阿德里安·乔弗伦克 Adrian Cioflâncă

director.name: 阿德里安·乔弗伦克 Adrian Cioflâncă

this_title: Amintiri de pe Frontul de Est
introduction: A photo album bears silent witness to history. Handsomely bound and carefully labelled, it traces the path of the 6th Regiment of the Romanian army in the war years of 1941 and 1942. Romania had allied itself with Nazi Germany to fight the Soviet army. This film soberly dissects the perspective of these war photographs. Making use of quotations from historical sources, it puts these banal images of everyday military life in a larger context, supplementing that which has been deliberately left out.
foreign_title: Amintiri de pe Frontul de Est
